review: I'm hugely disappointed with the Google Chrome and ChromeCast application! I use a Google (Samsung) Nexus 10 tablet and a Samsung Galaxy S 4 phone - on BOTH devices I use the YouTube application to cast videos to my TV. Half the time the ChromeCast application cannot find the physical ChromeCast device even though I am standing less than 5 feet away from it and my wireless signal is at full bars (close to 100%). When I finally do make a connection and try to cast a YouTube video it will work sometimes, but mostly (about 80% of the time) it will fail with a Brain Freeze error and then I have to reset everything to get it working again...! I have changed out the physical ChromeCast device with 2 other devices yet I still get the same error. Very DISAPPOINTED!!!
